name: part_004
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ生誕祭2026】Glitter of Love⧸誕生日記念3DLIVE【尾丸ポルカ⧸ホロライブ】 [zzVcTQOdLZE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka and friends conclude their performance of 'Trio Dreams.'
A transition scene featuring stylistic visuals and light effects.
Omaru Polka and Houshou Marine perform 'Awakening Harmony.'
Transition into the next song with atmospheric visuals.
Omaru Polka, Houshou Marine, and Shiranui Flare begin performing 'Triangle Dreamer.'

subtitles.original: もっと美しい方へ
subtitles.english: Towards a more beautiful place

subtitles.original: 君がいるからパワー 生まれるよ今日も
subtitles.english: Because you are here, power is born today too

subtitles.original: Let's try Trio Dreams
subtitles.english: Let's try Trio Dreams

subtitles.original: Let's sing Let's swing Let's dance Let's ball Let's smile Let's fight Woo Please go
subtitles.english: Let's sing Let's swing Let's dance Let's ball Let's smile Let's fight Woo Please go

subtitles.original: Let's sing Let's swing Let's dance Let's ball Let's smile Let's fight
subtitles.english: Let's sing Let's swing Let's dance Let's ball Let's smile Let's fight

subtitles.original: Awakening Harmony
subtitles.english: Awakening Harmony

subtitles.original: 暗闇の真ん中
subtitles.english: In the middle of darkness

subtitles.original: 真っ直ぐな眼差し
subtitles.english: A straight gaze

subtitles.original: 立ち上がる姿 ちゃんと見ていたよ
subtitles.english: I was watching your figure as you stood up

subtitles.original: 閉じ込められそうな 心を奮い立たせ
subtitles.english: Stirring up the heart that seemed likely to be trapped

subtitles.original: 収まりきらない 輝きを放ち
subtitles.english: Releasing a brilliance that cannot be contained

subtitles.original: 射抜かれた胸の奥
subtitles.english: Deep in the heart that was shot through

subtitles.original: 焼き付いたままの熱さは
subtitles.english: The heat that remains scorched in

subtitles.original: それだけでも 自由になれるって言って
subtitles.english: Say that even that alone can set me free

subtitles.original: 取り戻したい 光の世界
subtitles.english: The world of light I want to take back

subtitles.original: その笑顔 勇気 涙 夢 希望の陽射し
subtitles.english: That smile, courage, tears, dreams, rays of hope

subtitles.original: 君と明日を 願う力で生まれる
subtitles.english: Born from the power of wishing for tomorrow with you

subtitles.original: 私たちのハーモニー 響け
subtitles.english: Let our harmony resound

subtitles.original: それでも暗闇は 訪れてしまうもの
subtitles.english: Even so, darkness is something that visits

subtitles.original: 惑わされないで 君は君だから
subtitles.english: Don't be led astray, because you are you

subtitles.original: 分かち合えた日々が 心を輝かせる
subtitles.english: The days we shared make the heart shine

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないこと 気付かせてくれる
subtitles.english: Letting me realize I'm not alone

subtitles.original: 抱えきれないほどの ありがとうの代わりに
subtitles.english: Instead of more thank-yous than I can carry

subtitles.original: 鍵をかけて 一つになる 受け止めて
subtitles.english: Lock it up, become one, accept it

subtitles.original: 取り戻すんだ 光の未来
subtitles.english: I'll take back the future of light

subtitles.original: 今 熱い思い つないで 叶えに行くよ
subtitles.english: Connecting hot feelings now, I'm going to make them come true

subtitles.original: 君と一緒に 願える奇跡
subtitles.english: A miracle we can wish for together

subtitles.original: 重ねて 広がっていくハーモニー 響け
subtitles.english: Layering, the expanding harmony, resound

subtitles.original: 目覚める時が来たね
subtitles.english: The time to wake up has come

subtitles.original: 本当の自分になる
subtitles.english: Becoming my true self

subtitles.original: 導く運命
subtitles.english: A destiny that guides

subtitles.original: 取り戻したい 光の世界
subtitles.english: The world of light I want to take back

subtitles.original: その笑顔 勇気 涙 夢 希望の陽射し
subtitles.english: That smile, courage, tears, dreams, rays of hope

subtitles.original: 君と明日を 願う力で生まれる
subtitles.english: Born from the power of wishing for tomorrow with you

subtitles.original: 私たちのハーモニー 響け
subtitles.english: Let our harmony resound

subtitles.original: トライアングル・ドリーマー
subtitles.english: Triangle Dreamer

subtitles.original: Day by day 日に日に 募る乙女心
subtitles.english: Day by day, day by day, growing maiden's heart

subtitles.original: 同じ
subtitles.english: Same
